function.name: refrigeratorMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to change the mode of the refrigerator.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to change the refrigerator's mode.

mode.description: The mode to which the refrigerator should be changed (e.g., fruit/vegetable, wine, meat, defrost).

weight.description: The weight of the item being placed in the refrigerator compartment.

weightUnit.description: The unit of the weight (e.g., kg, lbs).
